GO and KEGG analysis for MAPP paper Chapter 1 Prerequisites 1.1 Libraries 1.2 Options 1.3 Universe set of genes 1.4 Render the book 1.5 Session info

GO and KEGG analysis for MAPP paper Ian U. Kouzel 2022-08-04 Chapter 1 Prerequisites 1.1 Libraries library(tidyverse) library(clusterProfiler) library(pathview) library(enrichplot) library(org.Hs.eg.db) library(readr) library(DT) 1.2 Options # GO analysis minGSSize <- 10 # minimal size of genes annotated by Ontology term for testing organismDB <- "org.Hs.eg.db" # human DB pvalueCutoff = 0.1 # p-value cutoff showCategory = 10 # number of GOs to plot 1.3 Universe set of genes 1.3.1 GO (ENSEMBL) universe <- read.table("data/inclusion_fractions_ALL_updated.tsv", header = T) %>% dplyr::select(gene_id) %>% unlist() universe <- unique(unlist(strsplit(universe, ","))) head(universe, 10) ## [1] "ENSG00000174371" "ENSG00000117009" "ENSG00000284770" "ENSG00000285053" "ENSG00000228058" "ENSG00000143774" "ENSG00000143801" ## [8] "ENSG00000225334" "ENSG00000143353" "ENSG00000117691" length(universe) ## [1] 11231 1.3.2 KEGG (ENTREZ) ENTREZ_universe <- read.table("data/inclusion_fractions_ALL_updated.tsv", header = T) %>% dplyr::select(gene_name) %>% unlist() ENTREZ_universe <- unique(unlist(strsplit(ENTREZ_universe, ","))) ENTREZ_universe <- bitr(ENTREZ_universe, fromType = "SYMBOL", toType = "ENTREZID", OrgDb= organismDB) %>% dplyr::select(ENTREZID) %>% unlist() ## 'select()' returned 1:many mapping between keys and columns ## Warning in bitr(ENTREZ_universe, fromType = "SYMBOL", toType = "ENTREZID", : 3.97% of input gene IDs are fail to map... ENTREZ_universe <- unique(unlist(strsplit(ENTREZ_universe, ","))) head(ENTREZ_universe) ## [1] "9156" "8564" "6905" "101927532" "2987" "5664" length(ENTREZ_universe) ## [1] 10785 1.4 Render the book bookdown::render_book("index.Rmd", "bookdown::gitbook") install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") 1.5 Session info sessionInfo() ## Chapter 2 GO and KEGG: common targets 06 2.1 Load the data 2.2 Gene ontology (GO) 2.3 KEGG

Chapter 2 GO and KEGG: common targets 06 2.1 Load the data data_MAPP <- read.table("data/inclusion_fractions_FG_COMMON_targets_05.tsv", header = T) DT::datatable(data_MAPP, options = list(scrollX = TRUE)) 2.2 Gene ontology (GO) 2.2.1 Prepare the gene list genes <- data_MAPP %>% arrange(desc(ABSDIFF)) %>% dplyr::select(gene_id) %>% unlist() genes <- unlist(strsplit(genes, ",")) head(genes) ## gene_id1 gene_id2 gene_id3 gene_id4 gene_id5 gene_id6 ## "ENSG00000136153" "ENSG00000007047" "ENSG00000124313" "ENSG00000197959" "ENSG00000108262" "ENSG00000163531" 2.2.2 Biological process (BP) type_of_GO = "BP" assign(paste0("GO_", type_of_GO), enrichGO( genes, organismDB, keyType = "ENSEMBL", ont = type_of_GO, pvalueCutoff = pvalueCutoff, minGSSize = minGSSize, pAdjustMethod = "BH", universe = universe, readable = TRUE)) df_GO <- eval(parse(text = paste0("GO_", type_of_GO))) if(nrow(df_GO) > 0){ DT::datatable(df_GO@result %>% filter(p.adjust < pvalueCutoff), options = list(scrollX = TRUE)) } else "no GOs were found" ## [1] "no GOs were found" if(nrow(df_GO) > 0){ barplot(df_GO, showCategory = showCategory, title = type_of_GO) } else "no GOs to plot" ## [1] "no GOs to plot" 2.2.3 Molecular function (MF) type_of_GO = "MF" assign(paste0("GO_", type_of_GO), enrichGO( genes, organismDB, keyType = "ENSEMBL", ont = type_of_GO, pvalueCutoff = pvalueCutoff, minGSSize = minGSSize, pAdjustMethod = "BH", universe = universe, readable = TRUE)) df_GO <- eval(parse(text = paste0("GO_", type_of_GO))) if(nrow(df_GO) > 0){ DT::datatable(df_GO@result %>% filter(p.adjust < pvalueCutoff), options = list(scrollX = TRUE)) } else "no GOs were found" if(nrow(df_GO) > 0){ barplot(df_GO, showCategory = showCategory, title = type_of_GO) } else "no GOs to plot" 2.2.4 Cellular component (CC) type_of_GO = "CC" assign(paste0("GO_", type_of_GO), enrichGO( genes, organismDB, keyType = "ENSEMBL", ont = type_of_GO, pvalueCutoff = pvalueCutoff, minGSSize = minGSSize, pAdjustMethod = "BH", universe = universe, readable = TRUE)) df_GO <- eval(parse(text = paste0("GO_", type_of_GO))) if(nrow(df_GO) > 0){ DT::datatable(df_GO@result %>% filter(p.adjust < pvalueCutoff), options = list(scrollX = TRUE)) } else "no GOs were found" if(nrow(df_GO) > 0){ barplot(df_GO, showCategory = showCategory, title = type_of_GO) } else "no GOs to plot" 2.3 KEGG 2.3.1 Prepare the the data # select gene_id in ENSEMBL format and DIFF from the result table DIFF <- data_MAPP %>% dplyr::select(gene_id, DIFF) # rename the gene_id column names(DIFF)[1] <- "ENSEMBL" head(DIFF) # create new df by converting ENSEMBL ID into ENTREZID and adding DIFF column # sort table by in descending order by abs(DIFF) genes_ENTREZ_df <- bitr(data_MAPP$gene_id, fromType = "ENSEMBL", toType = "ENTREZID", OrgDb= organismDB) %>% left_join(DIFF, by = "ENSEMBL") %>% arrange(desc(abs(DIFF))) ## 'select()' returned 1:1 mapping between keys and columns ## Warning in bitr(data_MAPP$gene_id, fromType = "ENSEMBL", toType = "ENTREZID", : 2.67% of input gene IDs are fail to map... head(genes_ENTREZ_df ) # create a vector with DIFF values genes_DIFF <- genes_ENTREZ_df$DIFF genes_DIFF ## Reading KEGG annotation online: ## ## Reading KEGG annotation online: ## ## Reading KEGG annotation online: if(nrow(KEGGresults@result %>% filter(p.adjust < pvalueCutoff)) > 0){ DT::datatable(KEGGresults@result %>% filter(p.adjust < pvalueCutoff), options = list(scrollX = TRUE)) } else "no KEGG pathways were found" ## [1] "no KEGG pathways were found"
